Title: Batanes

Actors: Ken Zhu, Iza Calzado, Joem Bascon, Bembol Roco
Plot: It was a whirlwind romance when Pam meets Ivatan Rico in Manila. She decides to give up her meaningless, stressful city life and follow him to Batanes to meet his parents Boy and Lydia and ...
